modName: Dawnguard - Night Cloak in human form
summary: The mod enables the Night Cloak ability to be used in human form.
descriptionHtml:
I can't believe this hasn't become a mod yet! Personally I really think this adds to the whole "Ooooooh I'm a scaaarrryyyy vampire who's very powerful!" effect.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What this mod does:

-Adds a spelltome to teach the Night Cloak ability to your character
-Acts just like its Vampire Lord counterpart, where it activates in combat

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Location:

The spelltome is located in the cell where you defeat Lord Harkon in the end of the Dawnguard DLC. Take note that the tome is located in the version of the chamber that is a separate cell from the rest of Castle Volkihar, so you will have to wait until the final battle with Harkon to obtain it.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Compatibility:

This mod should be compatible with every other mod on the Nexus, however if it isn't, please leave a comment or private message me, explaining the specific issue and which mod is conflicting with mine.
author: Frinovskii
